items: (1) Hirokazu Takahashi, Masayuki Nakao, Takenori Okusa, Yotaro Hatamura, Yataro Kikuchi, and Kimitaka Kaga: “A voice-generation system using an intramouth vibrator.” Journal of Artificial Organs 4 (4): pp. 288-294, 2001 (doi: 10.1007/BF02480019)
